target_markets.market_description: Content creators and streamers looking to monetize across platforms
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Facebook actively recruiting gaming creators for their program

problems_validated.problem: Views don't equal engagement - 300,000 YouTube views less valuable than 300 live viewers
problems_validated.market_gap: Creators not understanding engagement value vs raw views

products_tools.name: Athletic Greens (AG-1)
products_tools.use_case: Daily nutritional supplement for optimal health
products_tools.pricing: free one-year vitamin D supply + 5 travel packs with first purchase
products_tools.metrics: over 7,000 five-star reviews, 10+ years of personal use

products_tools.name: Twitch
products_tools.use_case: Live streaming with highly engaged audiences
products_tools.metrics: 300 live viewers described as more valuable than 300K YouTube views

business_strategies.strategy: Platform diversification - moving from YouTube to Twitch to Facebook Gaming
business_strategies.implementation: Get recruited by platforms offering creator programs
business_strategies.case_study: Harley's transition from YouTube to Facebook Gaming program

business_strategies.strategy: Focus on engaged audience over view count
business_strategies.implementation: Prioritize live streaming and real-time audience interaction
business_strategies.expected_results: Higher value audience that acts as ambassadors
business_strategies.case_study: 300 live viewers worth more than 300K YouTube views

problems_solutions.problem: Twitter toxicity and anonymous bot harassment
problems_solutions.solution: Understanding platform dynamics and managing public engagement carefully

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Focusing solely on view count metrics instead of engagement quality
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Missing out on more valuable, engaged audiences
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Prioritize live engagement and audience loyalty over raw numbers
mistakes_to_avoid.example: 300 live viewers being more valuable than 300K YouTube views

mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Think before engaging in public disputes, especially with people you might know
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Harley and Greg's initial Twitter disagreement over gratitude posts

growth_tactics.tactic: Build ambassador-level audience through live streaming
steps: Create community that wants you to succeed
growth_tactics.results_expected: Highly engaged audience that promotes your content

metrics_kpis.metric: Live viewer engagement vs total views
metrics_kpis.tracking_method: Monitor live stream attendance and interaction
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Focus on building loyal, engaged community over view count

trends_signals.trend: Platform migration from YouTube to newer platforms like Facebook Gaming
trends_signals.opportunity: Early adoption of emerging creator programs can be highly profitable

trends_signals.trend: Shift from view-based to engagement-based creator economy
trends_signals.opportunity: Creators who understand engagement value will outperform view-focused competitors

actionable_quotes.quote: 300 viewers that will watch you when you go live every time that 300 viewers is literally worth more than 300,000 views on youtube
actionable_quotes.context: Discussing the value of engaged live audiences vs passive video views
actionable_quotes.actionability: Prioritize building engaged live audience over chasing view counts

actionable_quotes.quote: these 300 people are like they're all ambassadors they're sitting here for hours dude they didn't watch your video they're here with you and they want you to be here tomorrow
actionable_quotes.context: Explaining why live engaged audiences are more valuable
actionable_quotes.actionability: Focus on creating content that builds ambassador-level fans

key_statistics.statistic: 300 live viewers worth more than 300,000 YouTube views
key_statistics.context: Comparing engagement value vs view count for content creators

key_statistics.statistic: Over 7,000 five-star reviews for Athletic Greens
